segments.text: Hello , it's my first time in Egypt . What would you advise me to see here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There are many famous resorts in Egypt . You can have a good time here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But I'm going to stay here only for two days .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm afraid two days isn't enough for you to see all the places of interest .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If I were you , the pyramid would be my first choice . It's so magnificent .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's really worth seeing . By the way , I'd like to buy some souvenirs .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You needn't worry about it . There are many stores at the scenic spots . I'm sure you can get what you want .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . I know what to do now . Thank you .
segments.speaker: S1
